name: 林美鍊
objective: 本課程在二技為2學分。介紹成本觀念與成本會計資訊系統，成本彙集程序，材料與人工規畫與控制，製造費用之規畫，差異分析，部門化會計處理及責任會計與報告。修畢本課程後能瞭解製造業之成本流程，材料、人工及製造費用之規畫與控制，責任會計與報告，因而具備了控制成本，提高效率之管理能力。
schedule:
Part1 Costs: Concepts and Objectives(成本概念及目標)
1. Management, the Controller, and Cost Accounting (管理、會計長與成本會計)
2.Cost Concepts and the Cost accounting Information System(成本概念及成本會計資訊系統)
3.Cost Behavior Analysis (成本習性分析)
Part2 Cost ACCUMULATION(成本彙集)
4. Cost Systems and Cost Accumulation(成本制度及成本)
5. Job Order Costing(分批成本法)
6. Process Costing (分步成本法)
7. The Cost of Quality and Accounting for Production Losses(品質及生產損失之會計處理)
8. Costing By-Products and Joint Products(副產品與聯產品之成本
Part3 Planning and Control Cost(成本的規劃及控制)
9. Materials: Controlling, Costing, and Planning (材料:控制、成本計算及規劃)
10. Just-in-Time and Backflushing(即時系統及逆算成本法)
11. Labor: Controlling and Accounting for Costs(人工:成本控制與會計處理)
12. Factory Overhead: Planned, Actual, and Applied(製造費用:規劃數、實際數及分攤數)
13. Factory Overhead: Departmentalization(製造費用:部門化)
14. Activity Accounting: Activity-Based Costing
and Activity-Based Management(作業會計:作業基礎成本制及作業基礎管理)
Part4 Budgeting and Standard Costs(預算與標準成本)
15. Budgeting: Profits, Sales, Costs, and Expenses (預算編製:利潤、銷貨、成本及費用)
16. Budgeting: Capital Expenditures, Research and Development Expenditures, and Cash; PERT/COST (預算編製:資本支出、研究發展支出及現金；計畫評核術 /成本)
17. Responsibility Accounting and Reporting(責任會計及其報告)
18. Standard Costing: Setting Standards and Analyzing Variances  (標準成本:標準之設定與差異分析)
19. Standard Costing: Incorporating Standards
into the Accounting Records (標準成本:將標準編入會計紀錄之中)
Part5  Analysis of Costs and Profits(成本利潤分析)
20. Direct Costing and Cost-Volume-Profit Analysis
(直接成本法、成本利量分析)
21.Differential Cost Analysis (差異成本分析)
22. Planning for Capital Expenditures (資本支出之規劃)
23.Economic Evaluation of Capital Expenditures(資本支出的經濟評估)
24. Decision-Making under Uncertainty(不確定下的決策制定)
25. Profit Performance Measurements and Intracompany Transfer Pricing (利潤績效衡量及公司內部轉撥計價)
scorePolicy:
1.考試:72分 (3次*24分/次)
2.上課綜合表現:15分
3.分組作業
書面報告：15分
materials:
1.William K. Carter(14th),黃金發編譯(13th)，Cost Accounting(成本會計學)，華泰文化事業公司，92年5月。
2.陳美月博士編著，管理會計學(Managerial Accounting)(第六版)-規劃、控制與決策觀念，台灣西書出版社，92/07初版。
